abstract: No financial details were provided about the deal, but current market prices would put it at almost $600 million.
snippet: No financial details were provided about the deal, but current market prices would put it at almost $600 million.
lead_paragraph: Liberty Global, the international telecommunications operator controlled by the billionaire John C. Malone, said on Friday that it had increased its stake in the British broadcaster ITV to almost 10 percent.

headline.main: Liberty Global Increases Its Stake in British Broadcaster ITV
